document.full_text: a 21-year-old chinese college student has been executed for stabbing to death a woman after the car he was driving struck and injured her, a case that has transfixed and outraged the nation.
document.title: chinese student executed: hit-and-run, stabbing death of woman
lines_and_colors: a 21-year-old chinese college student has been executed for stabbing to death a woman after the car he was driving struck and injured her, a case that has transfixed and outraged the nation.
